name: stupid RPG testing thing.
description:
this is a really stupid "game", it's basically a collection of a bunch of tests for an rpg game, basically I have this project which is where I test all my ideas, for RPGS and other things, this "game" is that project, it's just a big collection of all my tests.

why anyone would play this? I have no idea.

is it fun? I guess, it's a dumb buggy mess thats just a bunch of dumb tests for features in my games, I guess it could be interesting to "see behind the curtens" a bit, but it's kinda like a "dev room" so it's not that interesting.

though I did make this playable, so it works, it's just dumb.
